The clips can be shared on social media or via direct message. The feature is currently only available on iOS and for users in the U.S. For the initial rollout, users can only share clips from a limited number of shows, including season one of \u201CThe Boys,\u201D \u201CThe Wilds,\u201D \u201CInvincible\u201D and \u201CFairfax.\u201D When you\u2019re watching one of these four titles, you can click on the new \u201CShare a clip\u201D button to create a 30-second clip. The app will then create a clip of what you just watched, allowing you to move the clip forward or backward to exactly where you want it. You\u2019ll also be able to preview the clip before sharing it with others.
